entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -41.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -41.1°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -45.1°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
